betterhiddenchat.persistency.off: Chat will not be persistently hid.
betterhiddenchat.notifyChatShow.on: You will be notified when the chat gets shown.
betterhiddenchat.notifyChatShow.off: You will not be notified when the chat gets shown.
betterhiddenchat.notifyAsOverlay.on: Your notification will be shown as an overlay.
betterhiddenchat.notifyAsOverlay.off: Your notification will be shown as a chat message.
betterhiddenchat.showWhileTyping.on: Chat will be shown while typing.
betterhiddenchat.showWhileTyping.off: Chat will not be shown while typing.
